name: In Other Words #3 Quiz | Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: My dog Scamp likes to ______ his bones in a ______ in the garden.
questions.explanation:
bury hole.

	The bury used in this sentence means to put under the ground. Hole is the opening in the ground.

questions.text: Liz and Lewis had a ______ time at the ______ today.
questions.explanation:
great fair.

	Great in this sentence means very enjoyable. Fair means place of entertainment, as in funfair.

feet size four.

	Your feet are the part of your leg below the ankle. Size is the measurement of an object, and four means the number 4.

questions.text: My cat has short ______ and a long ______.
questions.explanation:
fur tail.

	Fur is the cat's hair, and the tail is at the rear end of a cat.

questions.text: Our ______ to school is along the ______ road.
questions.explanation:
route main.

	A route is the way taken to get from a starting point to a destination, and main means the most important.

questions.text: We went to church to ______ and sing a ______.
questions.explanation:
pray hymn.

	To pray a form of spoken or silent worship, and a hymn is a song of worship.

questions.text: My friend Steve plays ______ guitar in a ______.
questions.explanation:
bass band.

	Bass means the low musical notes, and a band is a group of musicians.

two four eight.

	These are all numbers: 2 times 4 equals 8.

grown hair.

	Grown in this sentence means to get longer, and hair grows on your head.

questions.text: The ______ car was parked with the ______ on.
questions.explanation:
stationary brake.

	Stationary mean not moving, and the brake is a device for stopping the car.
